post.body: better url on Kevin Rathbun #thanksgiving menu (can't type) www.eveningedge.com/dinnerdare
Kevin Rathbun's #thanksgiving menu, www.eveningedge.com/dinner dare has turkey but not traditional turkey
For a kid-friendly Friday recipe 2day, we picked Barbecue Potato Chip Chicken Nuggets. High cuisine, it's not. But crunchy and fun, it is.
Oh, And the Golden Buzz recipes go online this morning, but they aren't there yet. But one of them is a recipe from Bacchanalia.
Richard Blais shares his New Year's resolutions in AJC Peach Buzz. Among them, "open a super-small hyper-creative joint in town!"
AJC Food section publishes its recipes of the year ( Golden Whisk Awards ) tomorrow. Happy New Year.
Am I the only person who loves fruitcake?
Is it soon enough to start holiday shopping yet?
Maple oatmeal cookies with an oatmeal stout beer. A suggestion from a story I just read about drinks that go well with sweets. & it's Friday
Couldn't we get just a dusting of snow? Seems unfair that New Orleans got some and we didn't.
Searched Twitter for #christmas cookie exchange: http://tinyurl.com/5j2948 one post suggests giving awards for best cookie.
Looking for some good web resources about planning a cookie exchange. First rule, apparently, is you gotta bring copies of your recipe.
